name: CatholicPrayers(German)
0:
caret
”Alexa, open catholic prayers german”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers german to do hail mary”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers german to pick a prayer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic prayers german
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Disclaimer: The skill content, for the prayers, is in German.

Have your Alexa say a prayer for you anytime you like. Just ask it to say a prayer from the list below or you can ask it to pick one for you by saying "pick a prayer."

List of Prayers:

Das Zeichen des Kreuzes (The Sign of the Cross in German)
Vater unser/das Vaterunser (Our Father/The Lord's Prayer in German)
Ave Maria (Hail Mary in German)
Ruhm sei (Glory Be in German)
Das Glaubensbekenntnis des Apostels (The Apostle's Creed in German)
Gegrüßet seist du Heilige Königin (Hail Holy Queen in German)
Anima Christi (in German)
Memorare (in German)
Der Angelus (The Angelus in German)
Heiliges Michael Gebet (Saint Michael Prayer in German)
